ProjectDesc: Goal Setter Web App built using MERN with Redux, Tutorial by Traversy Media. Learned how to use Redux and implement it on a MERN stack.
URL Shortening Web App using React, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS. Designed by Frontendmentor. Implement API for URL Shortening.
QR Code Generator using REACT, TailwindCSS, and TypeScript. Designed by Frontendmentor. Coded and implement a Debouncer for delaying API requests.
Sign Up Form Component using REACT, TailwindCSS, and TypeScript. Designed by Frontendmentor. Learn how to use Framer Motion and built a responsive website using TailwindCSS.
Version 1 of James Romero's Web Portfolio
A Mobile Game made using Android Studio in Java. The app will randomly choose a number and the user will have to guess it in 10 tries
A Math Puzzle-Based Game inspired with Sokoban. Developed a game using Godot for a Capstone Project. Recognized as the Best Thesis during 2023 Symposium at STI College Cubao.
A Memory Platformer Game made using Godot. My first game jam experience using Godot.
